net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp

Class MediaCodecInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • net.majorkernelpanic.streaming.rtp.MediaCodecInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class MediaCodecInputStream
extends java.io.InputStream
    An InputStream that uses data from a MediaCodec. The purpose of this class is to interface existing RTP packetizers of libstreaming with the new MediaCodec API. This class is not thread safe !
